missingRGAATaggedRules.description: Ensure <area> elements of image maps have alternative text
missingRGAATaggedRules.help: Active <area> elements must have alternative text

missingRGAATaggedRules.description: Ensure every ARIA button, link and menuitem has an accessible name
missingRGAATaggedRules.help: ARIA commands must have an accessible name

missingRGAATaggedRules.description: Ensure ARIA attributes are used as described in the specification of the element's role
missingRGAATaggedRules.help: ARIA attributes must be used as specified for the element's role

missingRGAATaggedRules.description: Ensure elements do not use deprecated roles
missingRGAATaggedRules.help: Deprecated ARIA roles must not be used

missingRGAATaggedRules.description: Ensure aria-hidden="true" is not present on the document body.
missingRGAATaggedRules.help: aria-hidden="true" must not be present on the document body

missingRGAATaggedRules.description: Ensure aria-hidden elements are not focusable nor contain focusable elements
missingRGAATaggedRules.help: ARIA hidden element must not be focusable or contain focusable elements

missingRGAATaggedRules.description: Ensure every ARIA input field has an accessible name
missingRGAATaggedRules.help: ARIA input fields must have an accessible name

missingRGAATaggedRules.description: Ensure every ARIA meter node has an accessible name
missingRGAATaggedRules.help: ARIA meter nodes must have an accessible name

missingRGAATaggedRules.description: Ensure every ARIA progressbar node has an accessible name
missingRGAATaggedRules.help: ARIA progressbar nodes must have an accessible name

missingRGAATaggedRules.description: Ensure ARIA attributes are not prohibited for an element's role
missingRGAATaggedRules.help: Elements must only use permitted ARIA attributes

missingRGAATaggedRules.description: Ensure elements with ARIA roles have all required ARIA attributes
missingRGAATaggedRules.help: Required ARIA attributes must be provided

missingRGAATaggedRules.description: Ensure elements with an ARIA role that require child roles contain them
missingRGAATaggedRules.help: Certain ARIA roles must contain particular children

missingRGAATaggedRules.description: Ensure elements with an ARIA role that require parent roles are contained by them
missingRGAATaggedRules.help: Certain ARIA roles must be contained by particular parents

missingRGAATaggedRules.description: Ensure all elements with a role attribute use a valid value
missingRGAATaggedRules.help: ARIA roles used must conform to valid values

missingRGAATaggedRules.description: Ensure every ARIA toggle field has an accessible name
missingRGAATaggedRules.help: ARIA toggle fields must have an accessible name

missingRGAATaggedRules.description: Ensure all ARIA attributes have valid values
missingRGAATaggedRules.help: ARIA attributes must conform to valid values

missingRGAATaggedRules.description: Ensure attributes that begin with aria- are valid ARIA attributes
missingRGAATaggedRules.help: ARIA attributes must conform to valid names

missingRGAATaggedRules.description: Ensure the autocomplete attribute is correct and suitable for the form field
missingRGAATaggedRules.help: autocomplete attribute must be used correctly

missingRGAATaggedRules.description: Ensure <blink> elements are not used
missingRGAATaggedRules.help: <blink> elements are deprecated and must not be used

missingRGAATaggedRules.description: Ensure each page has at least one mechanism for a user to bypass navigation and jump straight to the content
missingRGAATaggedRules.help: Page must have means to bypass repeated blocks

missingRGAATaggedRules.description: Ensure content is not locked to any specific display orientation, and the content is operable in all display orientations
missingRGAATaggedRules.help: CSS Media queries must not lock display orientation

missingRGAATaggedRules.description: Ensure <dl> elements are structured correctly
missingRGAATaggedRules.help: <dl> elements must only directly contain properly-ordered <dt> and <dd> groups, <script>, <template> or <div> elements

missingRGAATaggedRules.description: Ensure <dt> and <dd> elements are contained by a <dl>
missingRGAATaggedRules.help: <dt> and <dd> elements must be contained by a <dl>

missingRGAATaggedRules.description: Ensure every id attribute value used in ARIA and in labels is unique
missingRGAATaggedRules.help: IDs used in ARIA and labels must be unique

missingRGAATaggedRules.description: Ensure elements in the focus order have a role appropriate for interactive content
missingRGAATaggedRules.help: Elements in the focus order should have an appropriate role

missingRGAATaggedRules.description: Ensure form field does not have multiple label elements
missingRGAATaggedRules.help: Form field must not have multiple label elements

missingRGAATaggedRules.description: Ensure <frame> and <iframe> elements with focusable content do not have tabindex=-1
missingRGAATaggedRules.help: Frames with focusable content must not have tabindex=-1

missingRGAATaggedRules.description: Ensure that HTML elements with both valid lang and xml:lang attributes agree on the base language of the page
missingRGAATaggedRules.help: HTML elements with lang and xml:lang must have the same base language

missingRGAATaggedRules.description: Ensure <input type="image"> elements have alternative text
missingRGAATaggedRules.help: Image buttons must have alternative text

missingRGAATaggedRules.description: Ensure that elements labelled through their content must have their visible text as part of their accessible name
missingRGAATaggedRules.help: Elements must have their visible text as part of their accessible name

missingRGAATaggedRules.description: Ensure <li> elements are used semantically
missingRGAATaggedRules.help: <li> elements must be contained in a <ul> or <ol>

missingRGAATaggedRules.description: Ensure <marquee> elements are not used
missingRGAATaggedRules.help: <marquee> elements are deprecated and must not be used

missingRGAATaggedRules.description: Ensure <meta name="viewport"> does not disable text scaling and zooming
missingRGAATaggedRules.help: Zooming and scaling must not be disabled

missingRGAATaggedRules.description: Ensure interactive controls are not nested as they are not always announced by screen readers or can cause focus problems for assistive technologies
missingRGAATaggedRules.help: Interactive controls must not be nested

missingRGAATaggedRules.description: Ensure <object> elements have alternative text
missingRGAATaggedRules.help: <object> elements must have alternative text

missingRGAATaggedRules.description:
Ensure bold, italic text and font-size is not used to style

elements as a heading
missingRGAATaggedRules.help:
Styled

elements must not be used as headings

missingRGAATaggedRules.description: Ensure select element has an accessible name
missingRGAATaggedRules.help: Select element must have an accessible name

missingRGAATaggedRules.description: Ensure that server-side image maps are not used
missingRGAATaggedRules.help: Server-side image maps must not be used

missingRGAATaggedRules.description: Ensure <svg> elements with an img, graphics-document or graphics-symbol role have accessible text
missingRGAATaggedRules.help: <svg> elements with an img role must have alternative text

missingRGAATaggedRules.description: Ensure the <caption> element does not contain the same text as the summary attribute
missingRGAATaggedRules.help: Tables should not have the same summary and caption

missingRGAATaggedRules.description: Ensure that tables with a caption use the <caption> element.
missingRGAATaggedRules.help: Data or header cells must not be used to give caption to a data table.

missingRGAATaggedRules.description: Ensure that <th> elements and elements with role=columnheader/rowheader have data cells they describe
missingRGAATaggedRules.help: Table headers in a data table must refer to data cells

missingRGAATaggedRules.description: Ensure lang attributes have valid values
missingRGAATaggedRules.help: lang attribute must have a valid value

missingWCAG21AARules.description: Ensure <meta name="viewport"> does not disable text scaling and zooming
missingWCAG21AARules.help: Zooming and scaling must not be disabled

missingWCAG21AARules.description: Ensure lang attributes have valid values
missingWCAG21AARules.help: lang attribute must have a valid value

missingWCAG21AARules.description: Ensure the autocomplete attribute is correct and suitable for the form field
missingWCAG21AARules.help: autocomplete attribute must be used correctly

missingWCAG21AARules.description: Ensure that text spacing set through style attributes can be adjusted with custom stylesheets
missingWCAG21AARules.help: Inline text spacing must be adjustable with custom stylesheets

missingWCAG21AARules.description: Ensure content is not locked to any specific display orientation, and the content is operable in all display orientations
missingWCAG21AARules.help: CSS Media queries must not lock display orientation
